org.jdrupes.mdoclet

Class Tags

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdrupes.mdoclet.Tags

  • public final class Tags
extends Object

    Utility class providing some helpers for working with tags.

        name - The tagâ€™s name.

        See Also:

      • extractInlineTags

        public static String extractInlineTags(String comment,
                                       List<String> target)

        Extracts all inline tags from the given comment and saves them in a target list.

        Example

        /**
* Foo { @link bar} bar.
* /

        becomes

        /**
* Foo { @} bar.
* /

        and the target list contains the string "{@link bar}".

        Parameters:
        comment - The comment to extract the inline tags from.
        target - The target list to save the extracted inline tags to.
        Returns:
        The comment with all inline tags replaced with "{@}".
        See Also:
        insertInlineTags(String, java.util.List)

      • insertInlineTags

        public static String insertInlineTags(String comment,
                                      List<String> tags)

        Re-inserts all inline tags previously extracted using extractInlineTags(). All occurrences of "{@}" will be replaced by the string at the corresponding index of the list.

        Parameters:
        comment - The comment text.
        tags - The list of saved inline tags.
        Returns:
        The String with all inline tags re-inserted.
        See Also:
        extractInlineTags(String, java.util.List)
